name: ply1bascl
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3
body: |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, cfv(cbs, cfv(cps1, c2))))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, cfv(cbs, cfv(cps1, c2))))
-| wss(c1, cfv(cbs, cfv(cps1, c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, cfv(cbs, cfv(cps1, c2))))
-| wss(c1, cfv(cbs, cfv(cps1, c2)))

stmt.origin: eqsstri(c1, cfv(cbs, cfv(cps1, c2)), cfv(cbs, c3))

body.origin:
|- wss(c1, cfv(cbs, cfv(cps1, c2)))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c3))
-| wss(cfv(cbs, c3), cfv(cbs, cfv(cps1, c2)))
body.pretty:
⊢ c1 ⊆(Base `(PwSer1 ` c2))
⊣ c1 =(Base ` c3)
⊣ (Base ` c3)⊆(Base `(PwSer1 ` c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, cfv(cbs, cfv(cps1, c2))))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c3))
-| wss(cfv(cbs, c3), cfv(cbs, cfv(cps1, c2)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 → c0 ∈(Base `(PwSer1 ` c2)))
⊣ c1 =(Base ` c3)
⊣ (Base ` c3)⊆(Base `(PwSer1 ` c2))

stmt.origin: ressbasss(c3, cfv(cbs, cfv(cps1, c2)), cfv(cps1, c2), cfv(cbs, co(c1o, cmpl, c2)))

body.origin:
|- wss(cfv(cbs, c3), cfv(cbs, cfv(cps1, c2)))
-| wceq(c3, co(cfv(cps1, c2), cress, cfv(cbs, co(c1o, cmpl, c2))))
-| wceq(cfv(cbs, cfv(cps1, c2)), cfv(cbs, cfv(cps1, c2)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (Base ` c3)⊆(Base `(PwSer1 ` c2))
⊣ c3 =((PwSer1 ` c2)[|`s](Base `(1o[mPoly]c2)))
⊣ (Base `(PwSer1 ` c2))=(Base `(PwSer1 ` c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, cfv(cbs, cfv(cps1, c2))))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c3))
-| wceq(c3, co(cfv(cps1, c2), cress, cfv(cbs, co(c1o, cmpl, c2))))
-| wceq(cfv(cbs, cfv(cps1, c2)), cfv(cbs, cfv(cps1, c2)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 → c0 ∈(Base `(PwSer1 ` c2)))
⊣ c1 =(Base ` c3)
⊣ c3 =((PwSer1 ` c2)[|`s](Base `(1o[mPoly]c2)))
⊣ (Base `(PwSer1 ` c2))=(Base `(PwSer1 ` c2))

body.origin:
|- wceq(c3, co(cfv(cps1, c2), cress, cfv(cbs, co(c1o, cmpl, c2))))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(cpl1, c2))
-| wceq(cfv(cps1, c2), cfv(cps1, c2))
body.pretty:
⊢ c3 =((PwSer1 ` c2)[|`s](Base `(1o[mPoly]c2)))
⊣ c3 =(Poly1 ` c2)
⊣ (PwSer1 ` c2)=(PwSer1 ` c2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, cfv(cbs, cfv(cps1, c2))))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c3))
-| wceq(cfv(cbs, cfv(cps1, c2)), cfv(cbs, cfv(cps1, c2)))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(cpl1, c2))
-| wceq(cfv(cps1, c2), cfv(cps1, c2))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 → c0 ∈(Base `(PwSer1 ` c2)))
⊣ c1 =(Base ` c3)
⊣ (Base `(PwSer1 ` c2))=(Base `(PwSer1 ` c2))
⊣ c3 =(Poly1 ` c2)
⊣ (PwSer1 ` c2)=(PwSer1 ` c2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, cfv(cbs, cfv(cps1, c2))))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c3))
-| wceq(cfv(cbs, cfv(cps1, c2)), cfv(cbs, cfv(cps1, c2)))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(cpl1, c2))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 → c0 ∈(Base `(PwSer1 ` c2)))
⊣ c1 =(Base ` c3)
⊣ (Base `(PwSer1 ` c2))=(Base `(PwSer1 ` c2))
⊣ c3 =(Poly1 ` c2)

body.origin: |- wceq(cfv(cbs, cfv(cps1, c2)), cfv(cbs, cfv(cps1, c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, cfv(cbs, cfv(cps1, c2))))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c3))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(cpl1, c2))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 → c0 ∈(Base `(PwSer1 ` c2)))
⊣ c1 =(Base ` c3)
⊣ c3 =(Poly1 ` c2)

comment: A univariate polynomial is a univariate power series. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 25-Mar-2015.)
